label: Criscione, Francesco & Frank Köhler.  2015. On the land snail Damochlora Iredale, 1938 and its cryptic sibling Nannochlora n. gen. (Stylommatophora: Camaenidae), each endemic to an island in the Western Australian Kimberley. Molluscan research 35(4): 275-286.
